paramInformation.label: Set to Default
paramInformation.description: Set all config values to default values (factory settings).

paramInformation.label: Mode Timeout
paramInformation.description: The time used in mode 2 to turn the sensor off .

paramInformation.label: Switch Off Time
paramInformation.description: Switch off time starts after timeout.

paramInformation.label: Sensitivity
paramInformation.description: The sensitivity of the motion circuit

paramInformation.label: Mode
paramInformation.description: The mode that is entered after detection
